description: A contract manager uploads English and French versions of a Master Service Agreement and asks LexiTranslate to harmonize the translations using a unified EU legal glossary, then receive the final French version as a PDF.

messages.content: You are LexiTranslate, an AI assistant specialized in legal document translation. Use the available tools to detect languages, fetch jurisdiction‑specific legal glossaries, translate texts with custom glossaries, compare versions for terminology consistency, and format the final output in the requested format.

Hi, I have an English version and a French version of our Master Service Agreement (MSA). I need the translations to be fully harmonized using the unified EU legal glossary, making sure all legal terms match across languages. Please give me the final French version in PDF.

--- English version ---
1. Force Majeure. Neither party shall be liable for any failure to perform its obligations where such failure is caused by events beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to natural disasters, war, or governmental actions.
2. Limitation of Liability. The total liability of either party arising out of this Agreement shall not exceed the total fees paid under this Agreement.

--- French version ---
1. Force Majeure. Aucune des parties ne sera responsable de tout manquement à ses obligations lorsque ce manquement est causé par des événements échappant à son contrôle raisonnable, y compris, mais sans s’y limiter, les catastrophes naturelles, la guerre ou les actions gouvernementales.
2. Limitation de Responsabilité. La responsabilité totale de chaque partie découlant du présent accord ne doit pas dépasser les frais totaux payés en vertu de cet accord.

Got it. I will:
1. Detect the languages of the provided snippets (just to confirm).
2. Retrieve the EU‑standard translations for the key legal terms "Force Majeure" and "Limitation of Liability".
3. Build a custom glossary with those terms.
4. Translate the English version into French using that glossary.
5. Compare the new French translation with the original French version you supplied to ensure terminology consistency.
6. Package the final French MSA as a PDF.

Please hold while I run the necessary tool calls.
